description: The RGM-40 Kastet light grenade launcher is intended to be used by law enforcement agencies for anti-riot control but can also be used to engage other targets.  It is muzzle-loaded, has a self-cocking trigger mechanism, an AK style pistol grip, and extendable buttstock.
//: Could not find a price on the internet, so I made it proportionate to other in-game launchers.
